##Synopsis

This is a simple analysis of weather events in USA and consequences to health of population and economy. 
The data is collected by NOAA (National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration) from 1950 to november of 2011 and can be downloaded from [here](https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fdata%2FStormData.csv.bz2). 
For a better understanding of data format the documentation can be downloaded [here](https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fpeer2_doc%2Fpd01016005curr.pdf).
